title: Melissa Rivers reveals where she scattered mothers ashes
text:
Melissa Rivers reveals where she scattered mother's ashes 
Technology Industry News.Net (IANS) : Wednesday 2nd September, 2015 
Actress Melissa Rivers has found a meaningful place to scatter some of her mother Joan Rivers' ashes. 
The 47-year-old "Fashion Police" executive producer and now panellist revealed that last month she scattered some of the comic legend's ashes in Wyoming -- where she, Joan, and her 14-year-old son Cooper used to take an annual vacation, reports etonline.com. 
"Coop and I took our annual family vacation to Wyoming. (The) first without my mom and scattered some of her ashes there so we can still be together every August as a family," Melissa said. 
Melissa shared a few images of her Wyoming trip on Instagram two weeks ago, specifically of Cooper enjoying the picturesque settings. 
"We are back where the buffalo roam wyoming vacation," she wrote. 
This Friday marks the one-year anniversary of Joan's death. She was 81 when she died. 
"Everyone expects me to have this big grand plan for September 4 and I am just going to be spending it with my son. He is going to go to school, I am going to go to work and come home and light a candle, and have a glass of wine," Melissa said. More Technology Industry News
